long_description: Built with reliable Shimano components, fast-rolling 29 in. wheels and a reinforced frame for quick handling, the women's Cannondale Tango SL 29er 4 lets you take on singletrack with confidence. Women-specific design is optimized for a great fit on large 29er bikes with a frame design that offers a low stand-over height. 6061 aluminum frame features sturdy, butted tubes and shaped chainstays and seatstays to improve efficiency and comfort. SL version features a reinforced triangle in the front of the frame and an oversize 1.5 in. headtube and fork steerer to enhance strength, rigidity and steering precision. SR Suntour XCM suspension fork delivers 80mm of travel with lockout adjustment. Adjust your gearing on the go with the dependable Shimano drivetrain, which uses Alivio shifters and Alivio derailleurs to snap through the 27 gears. Shimano M446 hydraulic disc brakes use a 180mm rotor up front and a 160mm rotor in the back to supply quick, powerful speed management in all conditions. Maddux DC4.0 rims are outfitted with versatile, fast-rolling Schwalbe Rapid Rob tires to provide confident handling and traction. Platform pedals mean no special bike shoes are required. Specs on the Cannondale Tango SL 29er 4 women's hardtail mountain bike are subject to change.
short_description: Built with reliable Shimano components, fast-rolling 29 in. wheels and a reinforced frame for quick handling, the women's Cannondale Tango SL 29er 4 lets you take on singletrack with confidence.
